opt.cliffExceedsVesting: Cliff period cannot exceed total vesting duration

opt.grantAlreadyCancelled: Option grant has already been cancelled
opt.insufficientVested: Insufficient vested options for the requested exercise
opt.invalidExpiration: Expiration date must be after grant date
opt.invalidPoolSize: Pool size must be greater than zero
opt.invalidQuantity: Option quantity must be greater than zero
opt.invalidStrikePrice: Strike price must be greater than zero
opt.noShareholderLinked: Grant must be linked to a shareholder to issue shares
opt.planExhausted: Option plan does not have enough available options
opt.poolCannotShrink: Pool size cannot be reduced below total granted amount

sys.rateLimited: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again in a few seconds.

txn.companyNotActive: Company must be active to create transactions
txn.exceedsAuthorized: Issuance exceeds the authorized total of the share class

txn.sameShareholder: Source and destination shareholder cannot be the same
